description: Ceiling of n*phi^2, where phi is the golden ratio, A001622.
references: Mohammad K. Azarian, Problem 123, Missouri Journal of Mathematical Sciences, Vol. 10, No. 3, Fall 1998, p. 176.  Solution published in Vol. 12, No. 1, Winter 2000, pp. 61-62.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (findIndices)a004957 n = a004957_list !! na004957_list = findIndices even a060142_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 26 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
